author: Melissa Beck
text: I learned how to put steamy pics in a private folder because people be scrolling in your phone when you hand it to them. Don’t worry! My old ass figured it out. #realworldhomecoming

author: Melissa Beck
text: The footage of the 2000 house meeting where I was *indeed* confrontational with David. I feel awful seeing it today. I did not understand him. I was hurt he wasn’t in a space to commune with me, but that never gave me the right to talk to him sideways. I am sorry. #RWHCNOLA

author: Melissa Beck
text: When Danny popped that cork. I can’t lie and say I wasn’t worried about my eyeball or my teeth. I just knew I was gonna be in an eye patch or looking like a jack-o-lantern within the first hour of arrival. I just knew it. That’s why I ran like that. 🤣

author: Melissa Beck
text: I ran a secret Instagram account where I reported on Covid news from around the world. Translated medical journals and everything. Told folks where to find the RIGHT masks. All that. I was on it, baby.

author: Melissa Beck
text: I was on my husband’s LAST nerve with my protocols but we did it.
